code: @Override public SerializedThrowable deserialize(final JsonParser p, final DeserializationContext ctxt) throws IOException {     final JsonNode root = p.readValueAsTree().     final byte[] serializedException = root.get(FIELD_NAME_SERIALIZED_THROWABLE).binaryValue().     try {         return InstantiationUtil.deserializeObject(serializedException, ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader()).     } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {         throw new IOException("Failed to deserialize " + SerializedThrowable.class.getCanonicalName(), e).     } }
